item.title: 力拓削减澳大利亚氧化铝厂产量以降低成本
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）位于澳大利亚的亚尔文氧化铝精炼厂的产量将减少近一半，因为废料库存已达到产能，该公司正努力降低成本，同时探索延长工厂寿命的方法。【原文：Rio Tinto Group will almost halve production at its Yarwun Alumina refinery in Australia as a waste stockpile reaches capacity and the company seeks to cut cost while exploring ways extend the plant’s life.】

item.title: Lumexa Imaging 提交美国首次公开募股申请，披露亏损缩减情况
item.description: 由私人投资公司 Welsh Carson Anderson & Stowe 支持的连锁诊断成像提供商 Lumexa Imaging Holdings Inc.【原文：Lumexa Imaging Holdings Inc., a chain of diagnostic imaging providers backed by private equtiy firm Welsh Carson Anderson & Stowe, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue and shrinking losses.】

item.title: 华平全球 PE 基金首轮募集 120 亿美元
item.description: 华平投资公司（Warburg Pincus）为其最新的全球私募股权基金设定了 170 亿美元的目标，迄今已募集到约 70% 的资金，这使其有望在全行业筹款依然低迷的情况下实现目标。【原文：Warburg Pincus has collected about 70% of a $17 billion target so far for its latest global private equity vehicle, putting it on pace to beat its goal even as fundraising remains sluggish industrywide.】

item.title: Cold Stone Creamery 所有者探索潜在出售及其他选择
item.description: Cold Stone Creamery、Wetzel's Pretzels 和 Mr. Sub 等美国和加拿大连锁餐厅的所有者表示，公司正在进行战略审查，可能会出售自己。【原文：The owner of US and Canadian restaurant chains such as Cold Stone Creamery, Wetzel’s Pretzels and Mr. Sub said it’s undergoing a strategic review and may sell itself.】

item.title: 跌势加深，亚洲股市注定下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者回避风险较高的资产，亚洲股市周二准备下跌，反映出投资者在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Asian stocks were poised to drop Tuesday as investors shunned riskier assets, reflecting caution ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s earnings and a US jobs report later this week.】

item.title: 债务期限临近，新堡垒能源公司正在进行债务延期谈判
item.description: Wes Edens 的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. is in talks with creditors over a forbearance agreement as it runs out of time to pay interest due on some of its debt amid struggles with project delays and cash flow.】

item.title: Arm 将在人工智能数据中心芯片中提供 Nvidia 的 NVLink 技术
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 计划开始将 Nvidia 公司的 NVLink 技术纳入人工智能数据中心的芯片设计中，从而加强两家有影响力的半导体公司之间的关系。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc plans to start incorporating Nvidia Corp.’s NVLink technology into chip designs for AI data centers, tightening the relationship between two influential semiconductor companies.】

item.title: 阻止基金退出后，蓝猫头鹰跌至 2023 年低点
item.description: Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的股价跌至 2023 年 12 月以来的最低水平，此前这家另类资产管理公司限制投资者从其最古老的私募信贷基金之一中赎回资金。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s shares have fallen to their lowest level since December 2023, after the alternative asset manager restricted investors from redeeming capital from one of its oldest private credit funds.】

item.title: 丑陋 "的技术面使美股涨势面临修正风险
item.description: 研究美国股市图表形态的分析师们警钟长鸣，他们担心最近的下跌可能演变成至少 10% 的全面调整。【原文：Alarm bells are ringing for analysts who study chart patterns in the US stock market, fueling concern that the latest dip could swell into a full-blown correction of at least 10%.】

item.title: 私募股权公司如何给一家人寿保险公司留下 22 亿美元的窟窿
item.description: 在一家私募股权公司开始重组一家陷入困境的人寿保险公司近十年后，当局正在努力解决 22 亿美元的资金短缺问题。投保人担心损失会改变他们的生活。【原文：Almost a decade after a private equity firm began reshaping a struggling life insurer, authorities are grappling with a $2.2 billion shortfall. Policyholders fear life-changing losses.】

item.title: UBS O'Connor 在 Cantor 交易前失去私人信贷主管
item.description: 随着 Cantor Fitzgerald LP 最终完成对对冲基金部门的收购计划，瑞银集团资本解决方案战略的联合负责人将不再管理其基金。【原文：The co-heads of UBS O’Connor’s capital solutions strategy will no longer run its funds as Cantor Fitzgerald LP finalizes a planned acquisition of the hedge fund unit.】

item.title: 芝加哥 "就业杀手 "企业税计划遭委员会否决
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提议向公司征收每名员工每月 21 美元的税款，但周一被市议会的一个委员会否决。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposal to levy a $21-per-employee, per-month tax on companies was shot down by a city council committee on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚大亨莱因哈特成为 MP 材料公司第一大股东
item.description: 澳大利亚首富吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）已成为美国稀土生产商MP材料公司（MP Materials Corp.【原文：Gina Rinehart, Australia’s richest person, has become the biggest shareholder in US rare-earths producer MP Materials Corp., boosting her global bet on strategic minerals.】

item.title: 鲨鱼宝宝 "创作者 Pinkfong 在首尔首次公开募股后大受欢迎
item.description: 在投资者对其首次公开募股蜂拥而至之后，"鲨鱼宝宝 "病毒性音乐背后的 Pinkfong Co.【原文：Pinkfong Co., the company behind the viral “Baby Shark” tune, is poised to begin trading in Seoul on Tuesday after investors flocked toward its initial public offering.】

item.title: 恐惧笼罩比特币交易者，他们押注自由跌至 80,000 美元
item.description: 比特币正处于自由落体状态，交易商们正准备迎接更多的痛苦。【原文：Bitcoin is in free fall — and traders are positioning for more pain.】

item.title: 高盛称中国 9 月黄金储备增加 15 吨
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group）称，由于各国央行在经历了夏季的季节性淡季后加快了购买金银的步伐，中国 9 月份的外汇储备中估计增加了 15 吨黄金。【原文：China added an estimated 15 tons of gold to its forex reserves in September as central banks accelerated their purchases of bullion after a seasonal summer lull, according to Goldman Sachs Group.】

item.title: 就业市场接近 "失速"，美联储主席沃勒支持再次降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）以劳动力市场疲软和货币政策损害中低收入消费者利益为由，重申了他的观点，即央行应在 12 月召开决策者会议时再次降低利率。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller repeated his view that the central bank should again lower interest rates when policymakers meet in December, citing a weak labor market and monetary policy that is hurting low- and middle-income consumers.】

item.title: 十大联盟 24 亿美元交易谈判在遭到反对后延期
item.description: 加州大学的投资部门正在给十大联盟成员更多的时间来考虑其价值 24 亿美元的新商业投资项目，此前至少有一个最大的成员表示反对。【原文：The University of California’s investment arm is giving Big Ten members more time to consider its $2.4 billion new business venture, after opposition by at least one of its biggest members.】

item.title: 美联储丽莎-库克就 "毫无根据 "的抵押贷款欺诈案向邦迪提出抗辩
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的律师团队对唐纳德-特朗普总统和其他美国官员提出的抵押贷款欺诈指控进行了详细反驳，并在致司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）的一封新信中辩称，这些指控 "即使是最粗略的事实考察也是不成立的"。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook’s legal team offered a detailed rebuttal to mortgage fraud allegations made by President Donald Trump and other US officials, arguing in a new letter to Attorney General Pam Bondi that the claims “fail on even the most cursory look at the facts.”】

item.title: 大豆期货反弹，因有迹象表明中国正在加大采购力度
item.description: 大豆期货跳涨，原因是有迹象表明中国正在加紧购买这种油籽，这给美国农民带来了希望，因为此前的购买似乎已经停滞。【原文：Soybean futures jumped on signals that China is stepping up buying of the oilseed, offering hope for US farmers after purchases appeared to have stalled.】

item.title: BMO 资本市场公司推进重组，高级经理离职
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）解雇了其资本市场部两位长期任职的董事总经理。【原文：Bank of Montreal let go of two longtime managing directors in its capital markets unit.】

item.title: 美国国债在谨慎降息的乐观情绪中走高
item.description: 国债收复了上周的部分跌幅，这使得 30 年期国债收益率升至一个多月以来的最高水平。【原文：Treasuries recovered some of last week’s losses, which lifted 30-year yields to the highest level in more than a month, in muted price action that was led by bigger gains for UK government bonds.】

item.title: 前新南威尔士银行行长乔丹认为，除非有必要，否则最好避免使用零利率
item.description: 瑞士国家银行前行长托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）表示，官员们不应排除恢复负利率的可能性，尽管这种措施最好避免。【原文：Former Swiss National Bank chief Thomas Jordan said officials shouldn’t rule out a return to negative interest rates, even though the measure is best avoided.】

item.title: 银行为 Novacap 的 Integral 广告债务交易寻求私人信贷
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，在与杠杆贷款投资者的接触无果后，华尔街银行正在寻求利用私人信贷，为 Novacap Investments Inc.【原文：Wall Street banks are looking to tap private credit to help finance Novacap Investments Inc.’s acquisition of Integral Ad Science Holding Corp. after an approach to leveraged loan investors fell flat, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 诺和诺德控股公司将出售 7.8% 的 Convatec 股份
item.description: 诺和诺德基金会（Novo Nordisk Foundation）旗下的诺和诺德控股公司（Novo Holdings A/S）将出售其在医疗技术公司康华特集团（Convatec Group Plc）7.8%的股份，从而退出其在康华特集团的剩余股份。【原文：Novo Holdings A/S, a vehicle for the Novo Nordisk Foundation, is set to exit its remaining position in medical technology firm Convatec Group Plc with a 7.8% stake sale.】

item.title: 特朗普关税推高消费者成本，全球最大铝生产商加价促销
item.description: 力拓集团正在对销往美国的铝货物征收附加费，此举有可能进一步扰乱已经因进口关税导致消费者成本上升而备受煎熬的北美市场。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is imposing surcharges on aluminum shipments it sells to the US, a move that threatens to further disrupt a North American market already roiled by import tariffs that are driving up costs for consumers.】

item.title: 阿根廷部长称大陆集团收购 Pluspetrol 页岩油田
item.description: 据南美国家经济部长称，压裂巨头哈罗德-哈姆（Harold Hamm）的大陆资源公司（Continental Resources Inc.【原文：Fracking magnate Harold Hamm’s Continental Resources Inc. is entering Argentina’s burgeoning shale patch, according to the South America nation’s economy minister.】

item.title: 英国考虑就钢铁关税问题报复欧洲的方案
item.description: 如果英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）无法达成一项协议来削弱欧盟提高钢铁关税的影响，那么英国正在制定针对欧盟提高钢铁关税提议的反制措施。【原文：The UK is drawing up countermeasures against the European Union’s proposed steel tariff increase in the event that Prime Minister Keir Starmer cannot secure a deal to blunt their impact.】

item.title: 人民币首席执行官认为非洲金融科技的崛起为大银行带来了机遇
item.description: 非洲市值最大的银行 FirstRand Ltd. 旗下兰德商业银行（Rand Merchant Bank）首席执行官表示，非洲金融科技公司的快速发展可以帮助传统贷款机构提高客户服务水平。【原文：The rapid advance of financial-technology companies in Africa could help traditional lenders enhance their customer service, said the chief executive officer of Rand Merchant Bank, a unit of FirstRand Ltd., Africa’s biggest bank by market capitalization.】

item.title: 尼日利亚与非洲的贸易因地区关系改善而增长 14
item.description: 尼日利亚海关总署署长表示，在政府加强地区联系之后，尼日利亚与其他非洲国家的贸易在今年上半年增长了 14%。【原文：Nigerian trade with other African nations grew 14% in the first half of the year, after the government strengthened regional ties, the country’s head of customs said.】
